title: Selection Project
synopsis: Due to a weak heart, Suzune Miyama has remained bedridden for most of her childhood. However, despite her illness, she has always dreamed of becoming an idol. Eventually, her opportunity comes in the form of the seventh Selection Projectâ€”a brutal series of competitions best known as the starting point of the legendary idol Akari Amasawa.
